script: There is a Town Hall in the center of my hometown.
I visited Library, which is 2 KM, West from Town Hall.
Statue of Founder is a location in my home town, it is 4 KM, West from Library.
I visited High Street, which is 2 KM, West from Statue of Founder.
Hospital is a location in my home town, it is 1 KM, North from High Street.
And finally there is Museum which is North from Hospital and 3 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Town Hall to Museum following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
From Town Hall, go 2km West to Library.
From Library, go 4km West to Statue of Founder.
From Statue of Founder, go 2km West to High Street.
From High Street, go 1km North to Hospital.
From Hospital, go 3km North to Museum.
